Detailed Description

USBConnection class is the child of the Connection class used for USB communitcation.

This is the USB version of the Connection class. It should be 100% functional when it is cast to a connection or vice versa....

See also:
Connection

BTConnection

Member Function Documentation

bool USBConnection::nxt_connect (  )  [inline, virtual]

Connect to NXT.

Connection function to link to the NXT, this must be called before any other communication can happen. In Connection class this function allways returns false or not connected.

Returns:
1 for connected, 0 for error.

Reimplemented from Connection.

void USBConnection::closeSensorOnPort ( unsigned char  port  )  [inline, virtual]

Close any sensor on the NXT.

Close any type of sensor at the specified port on the NXT. In the Connection class this does nothing.

Parameters:
port The port to close the NXT on.

Reimplemented from Connection.

void USBConnection::nxt_set_motor ( int  speed,
int  motor 
) [inline, virtual]

Set the speed of a given motor.

Send a speed value to a specified motor that will set that motor to that speed till a new value is recieved. In the Connection class this does nothing.

Parameters:
speed The speed value to send to the motor (0-100).
motor The motor port #(0,1,2 or FF for all 3).

Reimplemented from Connection.

void USBConnection::nxt_set_motor_with_limit ( int  speed,
int  limit,
int  motor 
) [inline, virtual]

Set the speed of a given motor for a given time.

Send a speed value to a specified motor that will set that motor to that speed for the specifed number of rotations. In the Connection class this does nothing.

Parameters:
speed The speed value to send to the motor (0-100).
limit The number of degrees to turn before the wheel stops (360 = 1 rotation)(0-FFFF).
motor The motor port #(0,1,2 or FF for all 3).

Reimplemented from Connection.

void USBConnection::openSonarOnPort ( int  port  )  [inline, virtual]

Add a sonar sensor to NXT.

Tell the NXT there is a sonar sensor on the specified port. In the Connection class this does nothing.

Parameters:
port The port to add the sonar to.

Reimplemented from Connection.

void USBConnection::setSonorContinuousReadMode ( unsigned char  port  )  [inline, virtual]

Set the Sonar to read continuously.

Tell the NXT to allways read sonar values while it is running, instead of only when a new value is requested. In the Connection class this does nothing.

Parameters:
port The port to set continous read mode on.

Reimplemented from Connection.

int USBConnection::getSonarValue ( int  port  )  [inline, virtual]

Retrieve a Distance value from the sonar.

Tell the NXT to return the newest sonar value from the sonar at the specified port. In the Connection class this does nothing.

Parameters:
port The port to read from.
Returns:
returns sonar value(0-100), in the Connection class this is allways -1.

Reimplemented from Connection.

void USBConnection::openLightActiveOnPort ( unsigned char  port  )  [inline, virtual]

Add a active light sensor to NXT.

Tell the NXT there is a light sensor on the specified port and to turn the sensor's led on. In the Connection class this does nothing

Parameters:
port The port to add the light sensor to

Reimplemented from Connection.

void USBConnection::openLightPassiveOnPort ( unsigned char  port  )  [inline, virtual]

Add a passive light sensor to NXT.

Tell the NXT there is a light sensor on the specified port and to turn the sensor's led off. In the Connection class this does nothing

Parameters:
port The port to add the light sensor to

Reimplemented from Connection.

int USBConnection::getLightValue ( unsigned char  port  )  [inline, virtual]

Retrieve an ambient light value from the NXT.

Tell the NXT to return the newest ambient light value from the light sensor at the specified port. In the Connection class this does nothing

Parameters:
port The port to read from
Returns:
returns light value(0-100), in the Connection class this is allways -1.

Reimplemented from Connection.

int USBConnection::getBumperValue ( unsigned char  port  )  [inline, virtual]

Retrieve an bumper value from the NXT.

Tell the NXT to return the newest bumper value from the bumper sensor at the specified port. In the Connection class this does nothing

Parameters:

Returns:
